channel.title: Epidemiology on Baki Cakici
channel.description: Recent content in Epidemiology on Baki Cakici

item.title: Detecting the Visible: The Discursive Construction of Health Threats in a Syndromic Surveillance System Design
item.description: Information and communication technologies are not value-neutral tools that reflect reality; they privilege some forms of action, and they limit others.

item.title: A Workflow for Software Development Within Computational Epidemiology
item.description: A critical investigation into computational models developed for studying the spread of communicable disease is presented.

item.title: CASE: A Framework for Computer Supported Outbreak Detection
item.description: We present a technical framework designed and implemented at the Swedish Institute for Infectious Disease Control for computer supported outbreak detection.
